betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oChannels are the main mechanic in applied energistics!

There are things that give channels, things that transport channels, and things that use channels.

This is done to efficiently manage your base with as little lag as possible!

Every machine in the mod (interfaces, buses, etc) uses channels.

The controller and the nergy acceptor produce channels.

Cables from the mod trasfer channels. Some transfer 8, and some transfer 32 channels.

If you connect a cable to too many machines (1 smart cable line connecting to over 8 machines) the entwork will error out, and it will not connect to machines.
